tool_description: Essential British slang translations for everyday conversation: Greetings, expressions, and phrases
name: British Slang Translator
title: British Slang Translator

api_list.name: getSlangfromLetter
api_list.description: Endpoint to get slang words starting with a specific letter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://british-slang-translator.p.rapidapi.com/slang/B"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "british-slang-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://british-slang-translator.p.rapidapi.com/slang/{letter}"

headers = {

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
